query:
INSERT INTO alerts (type, severity, title, description, indicatorCode, isRead, createdAt) VALUES
('connector_failure', 'critical', 'World Bank API Connection Failed', 'Unable to fetch data from World Bank WDI API. Connection timed out after 30 seconds.', 'WB_GDP', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 2 HOUR),
('stale_data', 'warning', 'UNHCR Data Stale (8 days)', 'Refugee data from UNHCR has not been updated in 8 days, exceeding the 7-day warning threshold.', 'UNHCR_REFUGEES', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 5 HOUR),
('data_quality', 'warning', 'Exchange Rate Anomaly Detected', 'Unusual 15% spike in YER/USD exchange rate detected. Manual verification recommended.', 'CBY_EXCHANGE_RATE', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY),
('connector_failure', 'critical', 'OCHA FTS API Error', 'HTTP 503 Service Unavailable when fetching humanitarian funding data.', 'OCHA_FUNDING', 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY),
('stale_data', 'critical', 'WHO Health Data Critical (16 days)', 'Health indicators from WHO GHO have not been updated in 16 days, exceeding the 14-day critical threshold.', 'WHO_HEALTH', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 3 HOUR),
('system', 'info', 'Scheduled Maintenance Complete', 'Daily data refresh completed successfully. 723 records updated across 6 connectors.', NULL, 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 6 HOUR),
('data_quality', 'warning', 'Missing Data Points', 'GDP data for Q4 2025 is missing from World Bank API. Using interpolated values.', 'WB_GDP', 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY),
('connector_failure', 'warning', 'WFP API Authentication Required', 'WFP VAM API requires authentication. Please configure API credentials.', 'WFP_FOOD', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 4 HOUR)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute INSERT INTO alerts (type, severity, title, description, indicatorCode, isRead, createdAt) VALUES
('connector_failure', 'critical', 'World Bank API Connection Failed', 'Unable to fetch data from World Bank WDI API. Connection timed out after 30 seconds.', 'WB_GDP', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 2 HOUR),

('data_quality', 'warning', 'Exchange Rate Anomaly Detected', 'Unusual 15% spike in YER/USD exchange rate detected. Manual verification recommended.', 'CBY_EXCHANGE_RATE', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY),
('connector_failure', 'critical', 'OCHA FTS API Error', 'HTTP 503 Service Unavailable when fetching humanitarian funding data.', 'OCHA_FUNDING', 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY),
('stale_data', 'critical', 'WHO Health Data Critical (16 days)', 'Health indicators from WHO GHO have not been updated in 16 days, exceeding the 14-day critical threshold.', 'WHO_HEALTH', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 3 HOUR),
('system', 'info', 'Scheduled Maintenance Complete', 'Daily data refresh completed successfully. 723 records updated across 6 connectors.', NULL, 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 6 HOUR),
('data_quality', 'warning', 'Missing Data Points', 'GDP data for Q4 2025 is missing from World Bank API. Using interpolated values.', 'WB_GDP', 1, NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY),
('connector_failure', 'warning', 'WFP API Authentication Required', 'WFP VAM API requires authentication. Please configure API credentials.', 'WFP_FOOD', 0, NOW() - INTERVAL 4 HOUR)
